techmeme.title: Sources: Mark Zuckerberg, frustrated at Meta's AI shortfalls, is personally assembling a team of AI experts and met engineers at his homes in recent weeks (Bloomberg)
Sources: Meta plans to unveil an AI lab dedicated to "superintelligence", led by Scale AI CEO Alexandr Wang, and is offering seven- to nine-figure compensation (New York Times)
SEC Chair Paul Atkins says the agency is working on an "innovation exemption" to boost onchain product creation and support Trump's vision of a US crypto hub (Stephen Katte/Cointelegraph)
Chinese state media: Huawei CEO Ren Zhengfei says the company's chips lag a generation behind US peers, and claims the US "exaggerated Huawei's achievements" (Reuters)
An analysis of X's new XChat features shows that X can probably decrypt users' messages, as it holds users' private keys on its servers (Matthew Green/Cryptographic Engineering)
